verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H6697>rock,<s%> Who <S%H3925>trains<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> for <S%H7128>war,<s%> [And] my <S%H676>fingers<s%> for <S%H4421>battle;<s%>

My <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress,<s%> My <S%H4869>stronghold<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> My <S%H4043>shield<s%> and He in whom I <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> Who <S%H7286>subdues<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me.

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H120>man,<s%> that Thou dost <S%H3045>take<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of him? Or the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H582>man,<s%> that Thou dost <S%H2803>think<s%> of him?
<S%H120>Man<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H1892>mere<s%> <S%H1892>breath;<s%> His <S%H3117>days<s%> are like a <S%H5674>passing<s%> <S%H6738>shadow.<s%>
<S%H5186>Bow<s%> Thy <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down;<s%> <S%H5060>Touch<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> that they may <S%H6225>smoke.<s%>
<S%H1299>Flash<s%> <S%H1299>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them; <S%H7971>Send<s%> out Thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> and <S%H2000>confuse<s%> them.

<S%H7971>Stretch<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> from on <S%H4791>high;<s%> <S%H6475>Rescue<s%> me and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> Out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1121>aliens<s%> <S%H5236><s%>

I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> to Thee, O <S%H430>God;<s%> Upon a <S%H5035>harp<s%> of <S%H6218>ten<s%> <S%H6218>strings<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Thee,
Who dost <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> to <S%H4428>kings;<s%> Who dost <S%H6475>rescue<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> His <S%H5650>servant<s%> from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H6475>Rescue<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1121>aliens,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H7723>deceit,<s%> And whose <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>

Let our <S%H1121>sons<s%> in their <S%H5271>youth<s%> be as grown-up <S%H5195>plants,<s%> And our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> as <S%H2106>corner<s%> pillars <S%H2404>fashioned<s%> as for a <S%H1964>palace;<s%>

[Let] our <S%H4200>garners<s%> be <S%H4392>full,<s%> <S%H6329>furnishing<s%> <S%H2177>every<s%> <S%H2177>kind<s%> of produce, [And] our <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H503>bring<s%> <S%H503>forth<s%> <S%H505>thousands<s%> and <S%H9539>ten<s%> <S%H9539>thousands<s%> in our <S%H2351>fields;<s%>

[Let] our <S%H9017>cattle<s%> <S%H5445>bear,<s%> <S%H369>Without<s%> <S%H6556>mishap<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3318>loss,<s%> [Let there be] <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6682>outcry<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets!<s%>

How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> are <S%H3602>so<s%> situated; How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7945>whose<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>
